DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate biomarkers affect hemodynamic response propofol . Particularly , investigator assess effect polymorphisms NOS3 PRKCA gene hemodynamic response propofol effect polymorphisms biomarkers relate nitric oxide propofol anesthesia . In addition , investigator evaluate effect propofol anesthesia biomarkers relate nitric oxide hypertensive patient chronically treat angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor .
DOC.brief_title: Hemodynamic Changes After Anesthesia With Propofol : Study Biomarkers
DOC.criteria: ASA I II BMI low 30 kg/m2 Severe hypertension Previous stroke Previous infarction Uncontrolled respiratory , renal , hepatic hematological disease .
